entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 8:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -27.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -31.0°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
